website_summaries.verdict: A kosher approved stove cleaner formulated to tackle the really tough stains on glass top stoves.
cons: Tends to leave some residue behind

customer_reviews.title: Best stovetop cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS PRODUCT! I hate my ceramic stovetop. I don't know what I was thinking when I thought we should switch our stove from gas to electric. All the cleaners I've tried don't work - or they leave a residue on my stove that show any type of mark of finger print. I was desperate and found Wright's Cooktop Cleaner. After scrubbing and wiping - I have a perfectly clean stovetop. It doesn't leave any type of film or residue and if you touch it after wards you can't see the finger prints! Defiantly will purchase again when I run out!
customer_reviews.author: sladerade85

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I use this cooktop cleaner and it is the best product I have found out there. You will not be dissappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Vedran

customer_reviews.title: Love This Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Use this all the time to clean my white cook top. It can be so hard to keep clean, but this stuff really works.
customer_reviews.author: Teach212

customer_reviews.title: Not just for cooktops
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I use it on my white porcelain kitchen sink to remove metallic marks left by my cooking pans. It removes the marks so easily and makes my sink look so bright white!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What ever happened to quality
customer_reviews.text: Yucky smell does not work nearly as well as Hopes cooktop cleaner. This used to be a respected company with a stellar reputation, no longer the case as their countertop cleaner is awful too.
customer_reviews.author: Coral Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Best of all I’ve tried
customer_reviews.text: This is easily the best ceramic cooktop cleaner I’ve used. No elbow grease required
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Cowne

customer_reviews.title: Waste of good money
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in this product. I went back to using dawn dishwasher soap. At least Dawn cleans the top. This product was worthless to me.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: This product seemed to work better than the pods etc. that are sold in the stores. I've got an old dishwasher and this does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Joseph

customer_reviews.title: good stuff, again.
customer_reviews.text: ; she loves it ; housekeeper insists that I order it,
customer_reviews.author: Ann R. Levine

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product cleaned stove great. No shine as described but that's ok that's the least of my worries
customer_reviews.author: nene

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the product. Did great job on cleaning the cook top.
customer_reviews.author: TD Puyallup, WA

customer_reviews.title: NO BIG DEAL!! .... MADE BY WEIDMAN ...
customer_reviews.text: NO BIG DEAL!!....MADE BY WEIDMAN AND USES ANOTHER NAME!!...VERY DISSAPOINTED IN PRODUCT!! RETURNED!!..
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: have to have for ceramic stove tops
customer_reviews.text: Have used it for years. it is a staple in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah E. LeFlore

customer_reviews.title: Does not clean well
customer_reviews.text: Product is watery. Does not really clean. Leaves a film.
customer_reviews.author: SANDRA C.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Better than any other in the market for getting cooktops clean.
customer_reviews.author: Georgeanne Stafford

customer_reviews.title: Basic.
customer_reviews.text: Cleaned our stove top fairly well, but didn't touch the tough cooked on foods. Left a nice shine, and.. the lingering burned on foods I bought it to remove. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CLEANER FOR MORE THAN YOU WOULD THINK!
customer_reviews.text: I use this, not only on my glass stove top; but, also on my glass shower door for soap scum, and chrome shower handle. It cleaned and shined all of them. I found that if I apply it with a small flat plastic scrubby, then, let it dry for just a few minutes, and wipe off with a damp cotton cloth, followed by a dry cotton cloth. It works great, even on stubborn burned spots on my glass stove top. I have allergies to some chemicals, and this one has only a mild odor and doesn't bother my allergies.
customer_reviews.author: L. Washburn

customer_reviews.title: Best stove top cleaner so far
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't find this at local grocery stores lately, but really prefer it to the others available for a glass/ceramic stove top. I would recommend also using a small plastic scraper with this if you have something really messy/stuck on, like cooked sugar. You can scrape a bit while it's damp, then wipe off when dry.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product for my cooktop. Stuck on food comes off with ease!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Eckers

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my stovetop. I always have a bottle in my kitchen cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: sherid

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This really cleans my glass top cooking! It is not sticky or doesn't have a smell. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: looks a little better than
customer_reviews.text: cleaned it up a little.looks a little better than before
customer_reviews.author: steven furman

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Did not meet my expiration. I did a lot of scrubbing to get anything burned on off, and still some stayed
customer_reviews.author: Sadusa

product_meta.title: Wright's Cooktop Cleaner - Cleans and Protects Glass/Ceramic Smooth Top Ranges with its gentle formula - 10 Oz.
feature_bullets: Restore - Bring your cooktop back to its original beauty by erasing the spills and stains on the surface
Reveal - Remove burned on food showing your cook tops natural beauty and shine
Revitalize - Scratch-free formula cleans & polishes with a gentle yet effective touch
Shine - Leave a streak-free shine while removing splattered food, grease, oily residue and watermarks
Use On - All major glass/ceramic cooktop manufactures including GE, Whirlpool, Frigidaire, Thermador

Wright's Cooktop Cleaner is perfect for your glass and ceramic cooktops, ceramic cookware, fiberglass, and shower doors. Wright's Cook top Cleaner won't scratch your cooking surface, yet it's tough enough to tackle hard-to-remove foods and stubborn stains. This product is Kosher approved.
